name: Dirk Syd Pharrell Goes to Work
name_original: Dirk Syd Pharrell Goes to Work
description:
Dirk Syd Pharrell Goes to Work.

This is an adventure game where you control Dirk Syd Pharrel working as an intern for a serious business company. The boss calls Dirk into his office and asks Dirk to write a memo. He says you can use his desk. 

Controls:

Use the mouse wheel to select different actions and click on stuff on The Boss's desk. 

Cursor - Look 

Lips - Talk

Hand - Interact

Ctrl-Q - Quit
